descript.abstract: Major rivers as derived from Pennsylvania Dept. of Transportation's streams database, which is organized by county.
descript.supplinf: For use at scales of 1:24,000 or smaller.

idinfo.useconst:

The Originator and Publisher should be clearly cited in any product derived from this data. Any modifications to this data must be described in any digital or hardcopy product derived from this data.

srctime.srccurr: Telephone call to Dwight MacLean at PennDot, GIS Specialist, 717-787-6036

srcinfo.srccontr: 1:24,000 USGS maps on mylar and type 10 mapping

procstep.procdesc: Converted Intergraph Microstation files to ARCINFO format. CD-rom titled Pennsylvania Carto/GIS contains both Intergraph and ESRI formatted files
